reviewText: This Blu-ray was put in my system just long enough to tell me it was region locked and wouldn't play
This set will not play on Region A (USA) Blu-Ray players.
Blu-ray did not play I have other region b Blu-ray's and they play perfectly but this would not.
I couldn't get the DVDs to work so I've got them just sitting my daughter hates she can't watch then since it was a Christmas present
